mapper.update:
UPDATE AC_OPERATOR
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=varchar},
password = #{password,jdbcType=varchar},
inval_date = #{inval_date,jdbcType=date},
operator_name = #{operator_name,jdbcType=varchar},
auth_mode = #{auth_mode,jdbcType=varchar},
operator_status = #{operator_status,jdbcType=varchar},
lock_limit = #{lock_limit,jdbcType=decimal},
err_count = #{err_count,jdbcType=decimal},
lock_time = #{lock_time,jdbcType=date},
unlock_time = #{unlock_time,jdbcType=date},
menu_type = #{menu_type,jdbcType=varchar},
last_login = #{last_login,jdbcType=timestamp},
start_date = #{start_date,jdbcType=date},
end_date = #{end_date,jdbcType=date},
valid_time = #{valid_time,jdbcType=varchar},
mac_code = #{mac_code,jdbcType=varchar},
ip_address = #{ip_address,jdbcType=varchar}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
